summary:
We offer customised language courses to organisations and individuals in 46 languages. Our popular language courses include Dutch (NT2 exam training), Spanish, German, Portuguese, French, and Italian. 

Our business communication trainings include Business English, Business Chinese, Business Russian and cross-cultural training. We train for official Cambridge exams and offer BULATS tests. We also provide editing and translation services.

An expert in expats, we understand that language is culture. We teach both. We designed our intensive language and culture training programme specifically to bring you from beginner level to fluency. Our experience in running this as an in-company training programme has consistently proved successful. 

We consider your goals, your schedule, and your results, drawing from over 25 years of teaching experience to make sure you have the relevant materials, tools and personal guidance. 

PCI is ISO and CEDEO certified and an NRTO affiliate. We work with other leading international organisations through selective partnerships to provide you with quality and personal services to achieve your goals.

Individual and group courses
We teach all our language courses to official certified levels. Along with our individual courses in 30 languages, we run regular group and individual courses for learning Dutch, English, Spanish, German, Chinese, Russian, Portuguese, French, and Italian. We can arrange group courses in any of the 30 languages we teach. We run regular group NT2 training programmes.
 
Did you know that you we do not charge VAT on our training fees? The law was changed in 2010, which means that private individuals no longer have to pay VAT on language training fees. Therefore all our language training courses are free of VAT. This has been made possible thanks to our BVNT2 certification.
 
Intensive language and culture programme
After completing this 16 to 20 week training, students should be able to carry on a normal conversation and master basic writing. This intensive programme consistently gives our clients optimal results as an in-company training programme. For more details of this training see our intensive Dutch language and culture programme.
 
Business Communication
We teach business English including the crucial cross-cultural aspects. We can also prepare your for the Cambridge English Certificate and BULATS. And we provide copywriting, editing and translation services.
 
Give you kid(s) a head start
We also provide second language group courses for children and teenagers. Our pre-school, primary and secondary school level language courses offer your child a life-long competitive advantage.

profile_positions.description:
Business English Certificate (BEC) examination training
Business English Certificates (BEC) are recognised by employers, ministries, government bodies and professional organisations throughout the world. This valuable suite of three qualifications provides clear proof that you have the English skills to succeed in international business.

We provide Business English exam training for BEC Preliminary, BEC Vantage and BEC Higher - giving you the tools you need to pass with success.

Our language courses provide a fun and intimate Business English learning experience that take place either one to one or in groups.
Whether you are a professional looking to expand your skill set, or a new arrival looking to settle in the Netherlands, we'll have the right course to prepare you for the BEC exam. Just contact us via the details on this website.

profile_positions.description: Chemical, pharmaceutical and biomedical consultancy, specialising in strategic planning. Set-up new biomedical divisions for scientific publishers in France, Italy and The Netherlands: Masson, Paris and Milan, Wegener-Tijl, Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Director/Owner

profile_positions.description: Developed a new division specialized in biomedical information for the pharmaceutical and medical instruments industries. The purpose of this new post was to develop a new division specialized in customising biomedical information as commissioned by industry. The challenging objectives were to increase short-term sales; identify long-term growth; negotiate and bring international publishing projects from initiation to execution; define product strategies, customer targets and new areas for marketing activities. Built and supervised an effective team of sixteen full-time staff members; defined its role and relationships to other international units; standardized procedures. Developed new database derived products which are now distributed worldwide. Acquired major clients including pharmaceutical and medical instrumentation companies such as: Bayer, Baxter, Ciba-Geigy, Glaxo, Hoechst, Merck Sharp & Dohme, Pfizer, Philips, Roche, Sandoz, Upjohn, and international organizations such as: World Health Organization, European Commission and NATO. Established and maintained professional relationships with top executives in the industry, with government departments and leading members in all branches of the medical profession. Negotiated international customer contracts establishing Elsevier Science as a major supplier to the healthcare industry.
